spell.name: Cleansing Flames
entries: You wrap the target in purifying flames. You can attempt to counteract a single poison or non-curse effect imparting the {@condition clumsy}, {@condition dazzled}, {@condition enfeebled}, {@condition fatigued}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition paralyzed}, {@condition sickened}, or {@condition stupefied} condition.

The target can choose to empower the flames with their life force, becoming {@condition drained|CRB|drained 1} (or increasing their {@condition drained} value by 1, if already under the condition) to grant you a +1 circumstance bonus to your counteract check.

spell.name: Rejuvenating Flames
entries: You create a gout of flame that both heals and burns. You restore {@dice 1d4} HP to all allies in the area, and those allies gain a +1 status bonus to Fortitude saves for 1 minute. Enemies in the area take {@damage 1d4} fire damage with a basic Reflex save.

1: You restore an additional {@dice 1d4} HP to your allies and deal an additional {@damage 1d4} fire damage to enemies.

spell.name: Shroud Of Flame
entries: You encircle yourself in an aura of protective flames.

Each creature that hits you with an unarmed attack, Grapples you, or otherwise touches you takes 3 fire damage. When you {@action Cast a Spell||Cast the Spell} and the first time you sustain it each round, each creature in the area takes {@damage 3d6} fire damage (basic Reflex save).

1: The damage caused by touching you increases by 1, and the fire damage when you {@action Cast a Spell||Cast the Spell} or sustain it increases by {@dice 1d6}.
